Ron -

They're certainly not "authoritative", but Sotheby's
usually notes sets as "associated" mitokoromono or
some such wording. I would tend to agree with you
that "true" mitokoromono would be made at the same
time by the same artist. Just my humble $0.02 worth.

Rich S
